item.title: Julie London - Cry Me A River
item.description:
Now you say
you’re lonely
You cry the whole
night through
Well you can cry me a
river cry me a river
I cried a river
over you
Now you say
you’re sorry
For bein’ so
untrue
Well you can cry me a
river cry me a river
I cried a river
over you
You drove me
nearly drove me
Out of
my head
While you
never shed a tear
Remember I remember
all that you said
Told me love was
too plebeian
Told me you were
through with me and
Now you say
you love me
Well
just to prove you do
Come on and cry me a
river cry me a river
I cried a river
over you
I cried a river
over you
I cried a river
over you
I cried a river
over you
